allow:
Bash("/mnt/c/Windows/System32/WindowsPowerShell/v1.0/powershell.exe" -Command "
Write-Host ''=== DOCENTES ==='' 
\(Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3001/api/docentes''\).data | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_nombre_completo }

Write-Host ''=== ESTADISTICAS GENERAL ===''
$stats = \(Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3001/api/estadisticas/general''\).data
Write-Host \(''Promedio: '' + $stats.promedio + '' | Alumnos: '' + $stats.alumnos + '' | Aprobacion: '' + $stats.aprobacion + ''%''\)

Write-Host ''=== NOTAS PUPILO 1000 ===''
$notas = \(Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3001/api/apoderado/pupilo/1000/notas''\).data
Write-Host \(''Total notas: '' + $notas.Count\)

Write-Host ''=== COMUNICADOS ===''
$com = \(Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3001/api/apoderado/pupilo/1000/comunicados''\).data
Write-Host \(''Total comunicados: '' + $com.Count\)

Write-Host ''=== PROGRESO PUPILO ===''
$prog = \(Invoke-RestMethod -Uri ''http://localhost:3001/api/apoderado/pupilo/1000/progreso''\).data
Write-Host \(''Promedio: '' + $prog.estadisticas.promedio + '' | Asistencia: '' + $prog.asistencia.porcentaje + ''%''\)
")
